Message:
the first one since coming to
my lord’s estate.

I knew who sent it.
And exactly because of that,
I couldn’t bring myself to open it.

Did she get impatient
with me since I’ve been
running away from her
plea for help for so long?

but I can’t open it...
Not with the way I am right now.

Because if I open up the letter,
they’ll be able to see just how
weak and ugly I really am.
